Name: Endless
About the game: After feeling restless, you decide to explore your apartment building. It doesn't take long for you to figure out that things are definitely not normal. Find all the endings, the secrets, and unveil hidden truths about yourself. Endless is a Horror Adventure game heavily inspired by games like The Stanley Parable. Rather than focusing on one specific genre of horror, this game takes inspiration from many other games and media alike. Gameplay and Features: - Explore your apartment in this non-linear Horror Game! - Experience creepy settings, jump scares, and chase sequences in this game! - Maneuver your way around and try to find all seven endings! Some might be difficult to find! - Each ending is a completely different experience! They each celebrate different aspects of the horror genre. - Think outside of the box and find the three secrets! These are definitely harder to find! - This game has roughly 30-45 minutes of gameplay.
